fields.name: ArticleCreated
fields.fieldText:
All special characters in the title of the article will be removed while creating the article URL.


﻿New article created!

fields.name: CH_KBMessage
fields.fieldText: In order to create an article, you should belong and search for an active KB Workgroup

screens.description: If no rule and no member matched regarding the same workgroup
screens.name: No_rule_match_found

fields.name: NoMatchNotification
fields.fieldText:
Dear user,


Unfortunately you are not part of an active KB Workgroup that matches the Case Product. Thus no article was created.

fields.name: ErrorMessageNoWorkgroupsFound
fields.fieldText:
Dear user,


Unfortunately you are not part of any workgroup related to that product. Therefore no article can be created
